trackingID.description: the identifier used within the administrative UI for pulling data

displayID.description: the identifier used for accessing the redirect page

redirectURL.description: the URL where accessors will be redirected to

siteTitle.description: the value of the HTML title tags for the redirect URL page

siteDescription.description: the value of the meta description tags from the redirect URL page

siteBannerURL.description: the URL of the preview banner for the redirect URL page

useLogin.description: indicator for if a login template will be used

loginPageBrand.description: the type of login page that will be used

createdBy.description: the username of the user who created the link
